data.text:
Calling all Mumbaikars! 

Explore the ethinicity of #Rajasthan and treat your eyes with some scenic views. 
Introducing #exclusive flight from #Mumbai to #Jaisalmer. 
Also, enjoy new connections to #Jodhpur & #Udaipur. 

#FlySpiceJet #Aviation #AviationLovers #Rajasthan #Travel https://t.co/Ked9uu2c8C
@JAYHiiND Hi, you can carry the same in your hand baggage as no documents are required.
@Ashishshaw9 Ashish, as checked, our staff at the airport has assisted you with the seat allocation. You may connect with our available airport staff for any further assistance.
@Ashishshaw9 Please allow us sometime, we shall get back soon.

data.text: @Radhekha Please note, in case of No-Show, only statutory taxes are refunded (If applicable). We've initiated the refund and it will be processed to the agency ID at the earliest. You may then contact the agency for claims.

data.text:
#SpiceJet organised an event in collaboration with an #NGO, Women in Aviation India. 

We invited over 50 8th-12th grader girls to educate them about different career opportunities in aviation for women.
Here's wishing our female team members, a very happy #WomeninAviationDay. https://t.co/zJ1RConqRs
